questions.question: Considering the overall design, what is the predominant color scheme employed in these sneakers?
Observing the lateral side, what contrasting color stripe is prominently featured on the sneaker's upper?
Focusing on the material composition, what texture is primarily visible on the sneaker's upper?
Examining the sole unit, what color is the midsole band visible at the shoe's perimeter?
What is the shape of the toe box of the sneaker, in terms of its curvature?
Based on the visible stitching and seams, what is the primary construction method of the shoe upper?
What type of closure system is clearly visible on the sneaker, securing the footwear onto the foot?
Considering the overall style, what category would these sneakers be classified as; casual or formal?
Considering the material of the outsole, what visual appearance would best describe its texture?
What is the visible design element on the side of the sneaker other than the color-blocking?
What is the primary visible material used for the laces that secure the shoes?
What appears to be the material used in the construction of the shoe's insole (inner sole)?
Observing the back of the shoe, what is the noticeable shape of the heel counter?
What color is the eyelets (the holes through which laces pass) on the shoes?
What is the visible design element at the connection between the upper and midsole?
